Radicons struck poses and transformed into Radistor. They didn't know what
this was about but they were going to do as Tigerhawk said. Radistor picked
up Tigerhawk and threw his at the base, watching and hoping they did well,
probably because Arrow was in control...
----- Original Message -----
From: <RgDaN@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, July 08, 2000 10:46 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars RPG


> Tigerhawk Goes on Comlink "Listen up here the details The ark is under
attack
> Archangel I need you to shut up don't say a word and listen. Take everyone
> you have here and go back to the ark and put up a defense one of you try
to
> get intouch with Lio Convoy I'm counting on you. I'm going into get Iron
> Raptor. Yeah I know this is Suicide but and all you think this is crazy
but
> someone great told me sometimes crazy works. OK Lets Move out. All except
the
> Radicon Form that giant robot I have a special job for you I need you to
> throw me at there shield man this is going to hurt as hard as you can."
> Tigerhawk points to a side of a the ship "Right there that should be
right.
> Tigerhawk coats himself in pure water and load the grenade into his gun.
> Flies up waiting for the Radicons.
> (Code after you throw me and I'm airborne I'll handle it form there.)
